name: Galatic Slapstick
description:
Controls

W & S - Move Up / Down

A & D - Move Left / Right

Space (On Air) - JetPack

When the timer runs out the controls are sent out of control by the space warp effect and Up may now be Down...! 

You are Alice, the greatest space explorer of all time. You were currently searching the galaxy for new signs of life and planets when your ship encounters a space warp Bermuda triangle of time. The ship is damaged and Alice must evade space objects using her jet pack until she can be rescued. The ships gravity system is malfunctioning causing out of control controls! 

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out of Control

Credits

Design - Claire Langton - Goh & Pablo Granado Valdivielso (Veguista)

Art - Claire Langton - Goh

Programming - Oana Furtuna, Pablo Granado Valdivielso (Veguista)
